rules_text:
Exile the top two cards of your library.
Exile a card from your hand. Draw a card.
Put X target cards exiled with Zachriel into their owner’s hands.
special_text:
[+1]: Exile the top two cards of your library.
[+1]: Exile a card from your hand. Draw a card.
[-X]: Put X target cards exiled with Zachriel into their owner’s hands.
